nodes.text: Ahalas Svindren was a male scholar from Commenor who became a Major in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. A charismatic debater and legal expert with a notably compelling voice, Svindren became a prominent Republic propagandist. His broadcasts were tightbeamed into Separatist space over the HoloNet, and Svindren delivered accounts of atrocities committed by the Separatist Droid Army, while using his legal expertise and debating skills to make point-by-point rebuttals of Count Dooku's arguments for secession.
